description: Shiratori is president of a model agency by day; however by night, she is actually a serial killer. She is also Selecao`s No. 11, and uses the cellphone to clean up evidence of her murders and cover up her crimes. She kills men by chopping off their penises ("Johnnies") with a cigar cutter. However, she only targets men who have victimised women, like rapists, and it is implied that she had been a victim herself, inspiring her current actions as a Selecao.
name: Shiratori Diana Kuroha
